scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development ejs-cli src/index.ejs > public/static/index.html && NODE_ENV=development concurrently "budo src/js/app.js:bundle.js --pushstate --live --dir public --serve bundle.js -- -t babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 stage-1 ] -t envify " "postcss -c postcss.config.js src/postcss/index.css -o public/static/main.css -m -w"
scripts.build: concurrently "chmod +x bin/generate-files.sh && bin/generate-files.sh" "browserify src/js/app.js -t [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -t babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 stage-1 ] | uglifyjs > public/static/bundle.min.js " " postcss -c postcss.config.js src/postcss/index.css -o public/static/main.css && cssnano < public/static/main.css > public/static/main.min.css && NODE_ENV=production ejs-cli src/index.ejs > public/static/index.html"
